publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Gulo Mäkäda, ṭabiya Taḥtay Qǝlʿat, qušät Däbrä Maʿṣo

note.desc: Possibly during the time of Zagwe dynasty, or even earlier.
note.ab: Däbr. The church stands on a separate peak, not directly accessible from the flat top mountain where the village is located. Local people say that they are descendants of a ḉäwa-group. A monastic community reportedly existed, but died out in Haylä Śǝllase I's time.

28 Mss. photographed: MY-001 "Acts of the Apostles"; MY-002 "Collection of Homilies"; MY-003 "The Rite of the Holy Week"; MY-004 "Acts of the Apostles"; MY-005 "Miracles of Mary"; MY-006 "Four Gospels"; MY-007 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; MY-008 "Four Gospels"; MY-009 "Miracles of Mary"; MY-010 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; MY-011 "Missal"; MY-012 "Homily of St. Michael"; MY-013 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; MY-014 "The Book of the Matrimony Rite"; MY-015 "Story of the Trinity"; MY-016 "Homily of the Sabbath"; MY-017 "Prayer of Incense"; MY-018 "Miracles of Mary"; MY-019 "Vita of John the Baptist"; MY-020 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; MY-021 "Litany of the Morning"; MY-022 "Synoptic Lectionary for the Year"; MY-023 "Vita of John the Baptist"; MY-024 "Homily of the Saviour of the World"; MY-025 "Homily of the Saviour of the World"; MY-026 "Miracles of Jesus"; MY-027 "Vita of ʾArägawi; Gäbrä Krǝstos"; MY-028 "Miracles of Jesus"
Tabots of John the Baptist, Michael, Gabriel, Mary, Libanos, George.
